title: Choco Chunk Cookies (Egg & Eggless)
description: One to one classes covering both egg and eggless versions with clear techniques and troubleshooting.

title: Red Velvet Cookies
description: One to one classes to master soft bakery-style red velvet cookies with flavour balance and texture tips.

title: Brownies Masterclass (Variants)
description: One to one classes covering classic brownies along with double chocolate, nut, Nutella, and cream cheese variants.

title: Banana Chocolate Cake
description: One to one classes for a moist banana chocolate cake with baking tips and common mistake fixes.

title: Healthy Bakes Masterclass
description: One to one classes featuring health mix chocolate cookies and sweet potato brownies with beginner-friendly methods.

title: Black Forest & White Forest Cake
description: One to one classes covering both Black Forest and White Forest cakes with layering, cream handling, and finishing techniques.

title: Piped Butter Cookies Masterclass
description: One to one classes covering piped butter cookies with vanilla, chocolate, rose, and coffee variants, focusing on piping consistency, shape control, and no-spread techniques.
